Package demoworld.model.adjustments

Class StatAdjustment

Object
Adjustment
StatAdjustment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adjuster
public class StatAdjustment extends Adjustment implements Adjuster
This is an implementation for adjusting a target Stat of a Character.
See Also:
  • Adjuster.adjust(Character)
  • Adjustment.adjust(Character)
  • Adjuster.unadjust(Character)
  • Adjustment.unadjust(Character)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StatAdjustment(String stat, int value)
    Constructs a Stat Adjustment with a string indicating the Stat it is intended to adjust and a value indicating by how much.

    Method
    Description
    Character
    adjust(Character character)
    Adjusts the target Stat's current modifier using the given value

    Gets the statKey assigned to this StatAdjustment
    int
    getValue()
    Gets the value assigned to the statAdjustment
    Character
    unadjust(Character character)
    Unadjusts the target Stat's current modifier using the given value, undoing the state change done by adjust.

  • Constructor Details

    • StatAdjustment

      public StatAdjustment(String stat, int value)
      Constructs a Stat Adjustment with a string indicating the Stat it is intended to adjust and a value indicating by how much.
      Parameters:
      stat - - the key used to indicate which Stat it should be used on
      value - - the value indicating how much the targeted Stat should be adjusted by
